ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Plane of Knowledge NPC's
ygData.msgSnippet: In addition to this  a lot of the quests require you to be a certainlevel in order to do them.  If you go to
ygData.messageBody:
In addition to this a lot of the quests require you to be a certainlevel in
order to do them. If you go to
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/qsearch.html?zone=158 at Allakhazam's you
will see alist of all the quests available and what levels for PoK


----- Original Message -----
From: "Thomas H. Comegys" <tcomegys@...>


> It's possible that you do not have good enough PoK faction for these NPCs
to
> continue and actually offer you a quest. A possible solution is the
"sewing
> needles for Willamina" quest. Talk to Willamina (loc neg 415, pos 1160),
and
> she sends you off on a Fed Ex quest involving 9 other NPCs, all in PoK.
>
> You finally get a book from her that, in addition to some minor stats,
also
> contains something called a "faction modifier", which I am assuming
modifies
> PoK faction to the point that others will give you quests, i.e. continue
> their conversations further.
>
> I have written down the names and locs of all the NPCs, if you want them.
>
> Froondor
